metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28636 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsing functionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability exists in Nef_S2/SNC_io_parser.h SNC_io_parser::read_sloop() slh->twin() An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.Note: sbeattie> possible regression introduced by fix, see GH issue 5514

criterions.comment: cgal package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
